meanings.definition: The quality or state of being slangy.
meanings.sent1: Her speech had a noticeable slanginess that made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the slanginess of his writing style; it makes the story more relatable.
meanings.sent3: The slanginess of his jokes always brings a smile to my face.
meanings.sent4: The slanginess of the neighborhood gave it a unique charm.
meanings.sent5: The slanginess of the song lyrics made them easy to remember.

meanings.definition: The use of slang or informal language.
meanings.sent1: The slanginess in his speech made it hard for some people to understand him.
meanings.sent2: Teenagers often use slanginess when talking to their friends.
meanings.sent3: His excessive slanginess sometimes leads to confusion in conversations.
meanings.sent4: The slanginess of her text messages reflected her casual personality.
meanings.sent5: The slanginess of the dialogue added a modern touch to the play.
